questions.question: You are tasked with creating a reinforcement learning model in SageMaker to optimize trading strategies for a financial application. What are the key steps you should take to develop and train this model? (Choose Two)
options: Deploy the model to an Amazon RDS instance to scale performance.
Use AWS Lambda to automatically trigger training when new data is available.
Define the trading environment, including the state, actions, and reward function.
Use the SageMaker RL estimator and train the model using local mode for faster prototyping.
Manually evaluate model performance outside of SageMaker using custom Python scripts.
correct_answers: Define the trading environment, including the state, actions, and reward function.
Use the SageMaker RL estimator and train the model using local mode for faster prototyping.
questions.topic: Deployment and Orchestration of ML Workflows
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
